1.title: Judgment on Nations
1.keyEvent: God pronounces judgment on surrounding nations

2.title: Judgment on Israel and Judah
2.keyEvent: God condemns Israel and Judah for their sins

3.title: God's Sovereign Judgment
3.keyEvent: God reveals His control over nations and Israel

4.title: Call to Repentance
4.keyEvent: Warning of famine and judgment urging repentance

5.title: Woe to Israel
5.keyEvent: Pronouncement of woes for social injustice and idolatry

6.title: Woe to the Complacent
6.keyEvent: Condemnation of Israel's complacency and arrogance

7.title: Visions of Judgment
7.keyEvent: Amos receives visions of locusts, fire, and plumb line

8.title: Vision of the Basket
8.keyEvent: Vision of summer fruit symbolizing Israel's end

9.title: Restoration and Judgment
9.keyEvent: God promises restoration and final judgment
